name: rock-slide
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.platinum: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.
